overview.en: Tokpie is the First Cryptocurrency Exchange with BOUNTY STAKES TRADING. TKP holders can get 500% discount on fees, 70% referral bonus, access to the bounty stakes depositing, regular airdrops and altcoins of promising projects, P2P loans with 90% LTV and income from TKP token staking (lending).
overview.zh: Tokpie是BOUNTY STAKES TRADING的第一家加密货币交易所。 TKP持有者可以获得500％的费用折扣，70％的推荐奖金，使用有希望的项目的赏金，定期空投和altcoins，具有90％LTV的P2P贷款以及TKP代币抵押（贷款）收入。
